question: Home and Community-Based Services (HCBS)
text:
Home and Community-Based Services (HCBS)
          
        
Part of a suite of Long Term Care (LTC) services available through the
Department for Aging and Rehabilitative Services (DARS)
in your home or community. These services are also known as waiver-funded services or waiver programs. HCBS provides for supports and services beyond those covered by Medicaid (or Medical Assistance) and allow a person to remain in a community setting by providing help with such daily tasks as bathing or dressing. More information is available
here
.
